column4: i can't believe how well compiz-fusion is running on the lappy with a nasty intel card
same here - my laptop's ATI 7500 runs smooth as silk!
whats funny is this laptop with vista on it won't handle aero witch has no where near the effects
this is a Pentium M 1.5Ghz, 768meg ram, ati 7500 32meg ram. Vista would run terribly on this, ubuntu's (largely) ok!
